review_text:
Older home in the heart of Columbus, IN. Lots to like about these accommodations. Bedroom #3 is around 15' x 20', hardwood floors with carpet rug/runners. There are 4 bedrooms total all of which appear available for occupancy. Host lives off-site at the time of this review. Conscientious host. Excellent communication, responsive, yet respectful of privacy. Ease in check-in with keypad which should allow guests to check-in anytime. Exceptional value.
There's a bit of confusing information in earlier reviews; hopefully, this may help to clarify a couple of things.
All bedrooms upstairs. There are two separate staircases leading up to a landing with one continuing upstairs. About 20 total (10 on either lower set, ~10 upper). One of those lower staircases is a bit narrow; however, the one facing the front door to the home is easier to navigate. If you can comfortably climb a typical staircase, you should be able to access your bedroom rather easily.
Super fast internet: 100 Mbps. Two (2) full bathrooms, one upstairs, one down. There is no need to go downstairs should one need to use the bathroom in the middle of the night. Shared living room downstairs is rooms with ample seating for comfort. Ping pong table in what was once a dining room. Thought I remember seeing some boxes games for guest use.
Refrigerator available (used for some water); however, I don't know about cooking options.
It's an older home with some character. Clean, simple. Dark curtains to block light. Ample motion-sensored night lighting for ease in moving around after dark both up and downstairs. The floors do creak a bit upstairs, light sleepers may wish to take notice. The door to my bedroom snagged a bit at the top making it difficult to open without the potential of disturbing other guests by making excess noise. Door to another bedroom had a similar issue which I discovered when awakened briefly during the night. Hopefully, host can plane those down for a smoother closure. Should my travels bring me through Columbus, IN again, I'd book again. Happy and safe travels!!
